venue.name: Cohen Auditorium inside the Aidekman Arts Center

item.description: Nobel Peace Prize winner, Muhummad Yunus presents his lecture titled "Social Business Can Address Pressing Social Problems.‚Äù Yunus is a Bangladeshi economist and founder of the Grameen Bank, an institution that provides microcredit (small loans to poor people possessing no collateral) to help its clients establish creditworthiness and financial self-sufficiency. http://www.muhammadyunus.org/ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_Yunus Immediately following the lecture, we will be doing a Jumbo Happy Hour at PJ Ryan's in Teele Square. We can share a couple of cold beers while discussing microfinance or any other subject that tickles our fancies. Note: Please RSVP separately for the Jumbo Happy Hour.
item.name: Jumbo Lecture: Muhammad Yunus
